NomaiObject: Clue to convey: Warp transmitters require a warp receiver (context: wait, the warp receiver isnt installed yet!) Excavation Site 1 CLARY: Friends, the White Hole Station's construction was completed today! 2 1 CLARY: I shall be jumping into the black hole shortly to test the White Hole Station. Oh, I cannot wait to jump into the black hole at last soon! 3 1 FILIX: How exciting, Clary! Once the White Hole Station is operational, we will finally be able to live without constant fear of falling into the black hole. 4 3 POKE: Wait, Clary! Do not jump into the black hole! 5 4 POKE: Filix, did she hear my warning?! Oh, Clary! 6 5 FILIX: Your warning appears to have been in time, Poke! Your sister was able to catch the Belaying Beam before the black hole swallowed her. But what happened, Poke? 7 6 POKE: I'll explain later, Filix! For now, Clary still needs our help: her maneuver landed her on the ledge right below the Belaying Beam! 8 7 POKE: For some reason, she hasn't come back up using the Belaying Beam.. Is she injured..? Oh.. Filix, we should hurry to her! BH_H EX1 1 BH_H EX2 6 BH_H EX3 4
